plugin.name: xBroadcast_Tick
plugin.author: Bast
plugin.purpose: Sends updates when the tick comes in from telopts
plugin.description:
[FOR PLUGIN AUTHORS ONLY]
Detects when a tick is sent through telopts
Example:
function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text) if id == "aaa70b4680508448e19b8b25" and msg == 1 then -- do something on tick end end

muclient.script:
require "var" require "pluginhelper" require "verify"
status = {}
function OnPluginTelnetOption (option) --- ignore not type 100.
if string.byte(option,1) ~= 101 then return end
itype = tonumber(string.byte(option,2))
broadcast(itype) if var.crontick == "true" and (status.statestring == 'active' or status.statestring == 'sleeping' or status.statestring == 'resting') then mdebug("Sending", "cr") SendNoEcho("") end
end -- function
-- pull in telnet option handling dofile (GetPluginInfo (GetPluginID (), 20) .. "telnet_options.lua")
function OnPluginInstall () if GetVariable ("enabled") == "false" then ColourNote ("yellow", "", "Warning: Plugin " .. GetPluginName ().. " is currently disabled.") check (EnablePlugin(GetPluginID (), false)) return end -- they didn't enable us last time
ldplugin("aaa79afcb20fa11787c5a327", "broadcast_state.xml")
end -- function OnPluginInstall
function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text) -- state change if id == "aaa79afcb20fa11787c5a327" then status = GetPluginVariableList("aaa79afcb20fa11787c5a327") end -- if end
function OnPluginDisconnect () return end -- function OnPluginInstall
function OnPluginConnect () return end -- function OnPluginConnect
function OnPluginSaveState () SetVariable ("enabled", tostring (GetPluginInfo (GetPluginID (), 17))) plugin_save_vars(options_table) end -- function OnPluginSaveState

add_option('crontick', {help="send a cr to mud on a tick", type="bool", default=verify_bool(false)})
option_set_default('cmd', 'btick') option_set_default('plugin_colour', 'orange')
init_plugin_vars() set_plugin_alias()
